text: I WROTE THIS SONG FOR MY WIFE.
♪ SINCE THE LAST TIME I SAW YOUR FACE ♪
♪ YOUR TWIN FLAME FROM A PAST LIFE ♪
♪ AND TONIGHT THE MOON IS FULL ♪
♪ I CANNOT KISS YOU YET YOU'RE MAGIC ♪
♪ SO I'LL JUST STARE AT YOU INSTEAD ♪
♪ CAUSE I KNOW YOU'RE TOO PURE FOR THIS ♪
♪ TO SAY THAT I FELL IN LOVE WITH YOU AT FIRST SIGHT ♪
♪ I WISH THAT I COULD FRAME ♪
♪ THE WAY YOU LOOK AT ME WITH THOSE EYES ♪
♪ MAYBE ASK YOU EARLIER BE MINE ♪
♪ DéJà VU TILL I MET YOU ♪
AND THIS IS FOR OUR UNBORN CHILD.
♪ I'LL SEE YOU IN MY DREAMS ♪
♪ NOW I HAVE TO SET YOU FREE ♪
